content: {"locationId": "2389", "organizationId": "1994", "name": "Community for Christ", "address1": "113 East Jefferson St", "address2": "", "city": "Camp Pt.", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "62320", "country": null, "phone": "217-593-7052", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "40.0408726", "longitude": "-91.0648055", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English", "features": "", "aboutUs": "Our Assistance Center offers a low-priced Thrift Store and the Food Pantry.  To access the Food Pantry, please come to the back of the Center, get a number from the ticket machine and wait till your number is called to come into the office.  Then the office staff will help you from there.  ", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 22, "regionName": "Central Illinois Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "c7ac99f6-662f-41d7-9feb-616facef2e6f.png", "website": "https://www.centralilfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Tuesday 9:00 AM-2:00 PM", "Thursday 12:00 PM-6:00 PM", "Saturday 9:00 AM-2:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
